relevant_findings.overall_condition: Did not appear ill but was in mild distress due to pain in left lower leg
relevant_findings.nasal_crusting: Improvement noted over previous 2 weeks; nasal septum intact, no polyps or blood present
relevant_findings.leg_examination: Tenderness and swelling in left lower leg from calf to dorsal aspect of foot, synovitis of left ankle present, nontender purpuric lesions on both legs, more numerous on left leg

changes_over_time.leg_symptoms: Swelling progressed from calf to foot, with tenderness on palpation and synovitis development
